We refer to the Postman software and services including any Beta Previews, together with our Websites, as "Services." By using our Services or otherwise interacting with our business, you acknowledge that you understand and agree to the terms of this Policy. If you do not agree with this Policy, do not use our Services. Where we provide the Services under contract with an organization (for example your employer), that organization controls the information processed and acts as the data controller. In those circumstances, we operate as the data processor and the contract may require us to process the information pursuant to the organization's instructions instead of pursuant to this Policy. This Policy does not apply to personal information we handle in our capacity as an employer. Information We Collect Information You Provide to Us Account and Profile Information: We collect information about you when you create a Postman account, create or modify your profile or your team profile settings, set preferences, or sign-up for or make purchases through the Services. This information may include a public username, password, contact information, billing information, a profile photo, and your account preferences and settings. Services Information: We collect content from your use of the Services, which may include any information about you that you choose to upload to, store in, or otherwise provide to our Services. We also collect information you provide directly to us, such as feedback and your responses to interactive features (such as surveys or contests). Support Information: We collect information you provide through a customer support request, such as your contact information, details and screenshots, or other information that you provide. Payment Information: We collect payment and billing information when you register for certain paid Services. We use external secure payment processing services to collect and process payment information, such as payment card details. Information We Collect Automatically When You Use the Services Services Use Information: We collect information when you interact with our Services, including the features you use, the links you click on, and your interactions with others on the Services. We may also collect information about the teams and people you work with and how you work with them, including, for example, who you collaborate with most frequently. Device and Connection Information: We collect information about the device you use to access our Services, including the type of device, connection type, device settings, operating system, browser type, IP address, URLs of referring/exit pages, device identifiers, and crash data. Cookies and Other Tracking Technologies: Postman and our third-party partners collect information through cookies and other tracking technologies. You may update your Privacy Settings, including opting out of cookies and other tracking technologies. See our Tracking Technologies Notice for more information about our use of cookies and other tracking technologies. Information We Receive from Other Sources Other Users: Other users of our Services may provide information about you when they submit content through the Services, such as in a support ticket or if they provide us with your email address to invite you to the Services. Similarly, an administrator may provide your contact information when they designate you as an additional administrator or the billing admin on your company's account. Other Services You Link: We receive information about you when you or your administrator integrate or link a third-party service with our Services. For example, if you create an account or log into the Services using your Google credentials, we receive your name and email address as permitted by your Google profile settings to authenticate you. The information we receive depends on the settings, permissions, and privacy policy controlled by that third-party service. Postman's use and transfer of information received from Google APIs to any other app will adhere to the Google API Services User Data Policy, including the Limited Use requirements.
